edu.iastate.cs.boa

Class BoaClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.cs.boa.BoaClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class BoaClient
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    A client class for accessing Boa's API.

    To use this class, first construct an object by either using the default constructor (to use the standard API domain/path) or providing the domain/path to the API. Then call login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) with your Boa username and password to log into the remote API.

    When finished with the object, close() must be called to log out of the remote API. The class is also AutoCloseable for use in a try-with-resources block.

    Example usage: 

     try (final BoaClient client = new BoaClient()) {
   client.login("user", "pass");

   // print all available input datasets
   for (final InputHandle d : client.getDatasets())
     System.out.println(d);

   // print info about the last job submitted
   System.out.println("Last job submitted: " + client.getLastJob());
 }
    Author:
    rdyer

        path - the path to the API (must start with '/')

      • resetDatasetCache

        public void resetDatasetCache()
        Resets the internal dataset cache.

      • getDatasets

        public List<InputHandle> getDatasets()
                              throws BoaException,
                                     NotLoggedInException
        Returns a list of available input datasets. Since datasets rarely change, the results may be up to 1 day old. The cache can be reset (see resetDatasetCache()).
        Returns:
        a Map where keys are dataset IDs and values are their names
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getDatasetNames

        public String[] getDatasetNames()
                         throws BoaException,
                                NotLoggedInException
        Returns an array of available input dataset names. Since datasets rarely change, the results may be up to 1 day old. The cache can be reset (see resetDatasetCache()).
        Returns:
        a Map where keys are dataset IDs and values are their names
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getDataset

        public InputHandle getDataset(String name)
                       throws BoaException,
                              NotLoggedInException
        Given the name of an input dataset, returns a handle (if one exists, otherwise null). Since datasets rarely change, the results may be up to 1 day old. The cache can be reset (see resetDatasetCache()).
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the input dataset to return a handle for
        Returns:
        an InputHandle for the specified dataset name
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

                            NotLoggedInException

        Returns:

        Throws:

        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getJobList

        public List<JobHandle> getJobList()
                           throws BoaException,
                                  NotLoggedInException
        Returns a list of the most recent jobs. The number of jobs is limited based on the user's web setting. This includes public and private jobs.
        Returns:
        a list of JobHandles for the most recent jobs
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getJobList

        public List<JobHandle> getJobList(int offset,
                         int length)
                           throws BoaException,
                                  NotLoggedInException
        Returns a list of the most recent jobs, based on an offset and length. This includes public and private jobs.
        Parameters:
        offset - the starting offset
        length - the number of jobs (at most) to return
        Returns:
        a list of JobHandles for the jobs starting at the offset and containing at most length jobs
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getJobList

        public List<JobHandle> getJobList(boolean pub)
                           throws BoaException,
                                  NotLoggedInException
        Returns a list of the most recent public (or all) jobs. The number of jobs is limited based on the user's web setting.
        Parameters:
        pub - if true, only return public jobs otherwise return all jobs
        Returns:
        a list of JobHandles for the most recent jobs
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getJobList

        public List<JobHandle> getJobList(boolean pub,
                         int offset,
                         int length)
                           throws BoaException,
                                  NotLoggedInException
        Returns a list of the most recent public (or all) jobs, based on an offset and length.
        Parameters:
        pub - if true, only return public jobs otherwise return all jobs
        offset - the starting offset
        length - the number of jobs (at most) to return
        Returns:
        a list of JobHandles for the jobs starting at the offset and containing at most length jobs
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getJobCount

        public int getJobCount()
                throws BoaException,
                       NotLoggedInException
        Returns the number of jobs for the user. This includes public and private jobs.
        Returns:
        the number of jobs the user has created
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API

      • getJobCount

        public int getJobCount(boolean pub)
                throws BoaException,
                       NotLoggedInException
        Returns the number of public (or all) jobs for the user.
        Parameters:
        pub - if true, return count of only public jobs otherwise return count of all jobs
        Returns:
        the number of jobs the user has created, possibly filtered to public only jobs
        Throws:
        BoaException - if there was a problem reading from the server
        NotLoggedInException - if not already logged in to the API
